alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 2:27PM CDT until June 08 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... Northwestern Cleburne County in north central Arkansas... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 226 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Shirley, or near Clinton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fairfield Bay... Greers Ferry... Shirley... Higden... Fairfield Bay Marina... Sugar Loaf Recreation Area... Edgemont... South Fork Recreation Area... Narrows Marina... Hill Creek Recreation Area... Brewer... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
